ComicInfo.Summary:
KICK-ASS IS BACK.
Patience returns from combat to find her husband gone and her neighborhood in ruin. By day, she waits tables and goes to college. By night, she pulls on a mask and becomes Kick-Assâ€”serving justice to local scumbags and taking a cut of their cash. With every bust, her list of enemies gets longer, and the city's worst criminals are out for her blood. Hyper-violent, high-octane brilliance KICK-ASS team, MARK MILLAR and JOHN ROMITA JR.
